OrgName.entry: INCLUSION PROJECT - YOUTH GROUP OF REFUGEES AND ASYLUM SEEKERS

AltName.entry: INCLUSION PROJECT - YOUTH ACTION GROUP FOR REFUGEES AND ASYLUM SEEKERS

Desc.entry: Part of Chilypep, which is a registered charity (see separate entry). Project aims to support children and young people aged 8-25 years who are refugees or asylum seekers. Helps to set up action groups to tackle some of the matters raised in Sheffield's Every Child Matters Consultation. Seeks to encourage young people to attend training, get qualifications for the work they do and undertake peer research in their communities with the aim of setting up their own projects to benefit people locally. Promotes the opportunity to represent their group within Sheffield Youth Council and participate in making decisions that will benefit other people in their communities. Holds a residential once a year to involve young people in training, making friends and having fun. A registered charity.
